00035     {
00036         // Call the Model constructor
00037         parent::__construct();
00038 
00039         self::$instance =& $this;
00040         $this->_ci =& get_instance();
00041         $this->_ci->load->database();
00042 
00043         $this->_ci->load->driver('cache', $this->_ci->config->item("cache_adapter"));
00044

00046             $this->init();

00063     /**
00064      * Inicializa la clase y comprueba que el usuario tiene
00065      * permisos de acceso a la url solicitada
00066      *
00067      * @return void
00068      */
00069     private function init()
00070     {
00071         $userId = $this->session->userdata('id');
00072 
00073         if ($userId) {
00074 
00075             $user = new User_Data();
00076             $user->setId($userId);
00077 
00078             if ( true === $this->login($user) ) {
00079 
00080                 return;
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         if ($this->_ci->uri->segment(1) != "login") {
00085 
00086             redirect("login");
00087             return;
00088         }
00089     }

00091     /**
00092      * Carga de las cuentas (Identidades) de un usuario
00093      * @param integer $idu
00094      * @return void
00095      */
00096     private function loadAccounts($idu)
00097     {
00098         //fetch user accounts
00099         $userAccounts = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00100 
00101         $where = array(
00102             "idu" => $idu
00103         );
00104 
00105         $orderBy = array(
00106             "idP" => "asc",
00107             "name" => "asc",
00108         );
00109 
00110         $this->_accounts = $userAccounts->find($where, false, false, $orderBy);
00111     }
00112 
00113     /**
00114      * Devuelve todas las cuentas de usuario, activadas o no
00115      * @return User_Data array
00116      */
00117     public function getAccounts()
00118     {
00119         if(is_null($this->_accounts)) {
00120             $this->loadAccounts($this->_user->getId());
00121         }
00122 
00123         return $this->_accounts;
00124     }

00126     /**
00127      * Devuelve la cuenta de usuario que pertenece a el id facilitado, activa o no
00128      * @param integer $accountId
00129      * @return User_Data
00130      */
00131     public function getAccount($accountId)
00132     {
00133         $enabledAccounts = $this->getAccounts();
00134 
00135         foreach($enabledAccounts as $account) {
00136 
00137             if($account->getId() == $accountId) {
00138 
00139                 return $account;
00140             }
00141         }
00142 
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145 
00146     /**
00147      * Devuelve las cuentas de usuario activadas
00148      * @return User_Accounts_Data array
00149      */
00150     public function getEnabledAccounts()
00151     {
00152         $tmp = array();
00153         foreach ($this->getAccounts() as $account) {
00154 
00155             if ($account->getEnabled() == 1) {
00156                 $tmp[] = $account;
00157             }
00158         }
00159 
00160         return $tmp;
00161     }
00162

00180         return false;

00213     /**
00214      * Activa una cuenta de usuario
00215      * @param User_Data $user
00216      * @return User_Data
00217      */
00218     public function activation(User_Data $user)
00219     {
00220 
00221         if ($user->isValid()) {
00222 
00223             $userMapper = User_Mapper::get_instance();
00224             $results = $userMapper->find($user);
00225 
00226             if (count($results) == 1) {
00227 
00228                 $user = $results[0];
00229                 $user->reset("activationCode")->setActivated($this->config->item('public'));
00230 
00231                 $userMapper->save($user);
00232 
00233             } else {
00234 
00235                 $user->setError("any", "Error");
00236             }
00237 
00238         }
00239         return $user;
00240     }
00241 
00242     /**
00243      * Envia un email de confirmación al usuario que solicita la baja en la aplicación
00244      * @return boolean
00245      */
00246     public function deleteAccount()
00247     {
00248 
00249         $this->_ci->load->helper("string");
00250         $code = random_string();
00251 
00252         $this->_user->setDeleteAccountCode($code);
00253 
00254         $userMapper = User_Mapper::get_instance();
00255         $userMapper->save($this->_user);
00256 
00257         $mailer = new Mailer();
00258         $subject = 'Baja en '.$this->_ci->config->item('appName');
00259 
00260 
00261         $data = array("id" => $this->_user->getid(), "code" => $code);
00262         $msg = $this->_ci->load->view("auth/baja_email", $data, true);
00263 
00264         return $mailer->send($this->_user->getEmail(), $subject, $msg);
00265     }
00266 
00267     /**
00268      * Elimina un usuario de la base de datos
00269      * @param User_Data $user
00270      * @return boolean
00271      */
00272     public function deleteAccountConfirm(User_Data $user)
00273     {
00274 
00275         if ($user->isValid()) {
00276 
00277             $userMapper = User_Mapper::get_instance();
00278             $results = $userMapper->find($user);
00279 
00280             if (count($results) == 1) {
00281 
00282                 $user = $results[0];
00283                 $userMapper->delete($user);
00284                 return true;
00285             }
00286         }
00287 
00288         return false;
00289     }

00291     /**
00292      * Genera un nuevo password para el usuario y lo envia a su cuenta de email
00293      * @param User_Data $user
00294      * @return User_Data
00295      */
00296     public function resetForgottenPassword(User_Data $user)
00297     {
00298 
00299         if ($user->isValid()) {
00300 
00301             $userMapper = User_Mapper::get_instance();
00302             $results = $userMapper->find($user);
00303 
00304             if (count($results) == 1) {
00305 
00306                 $user = $results[0];
00307                 $this->_ci->load->helper("string");
00308                  
00309                 $newPass = random_string("alnum", 6);
00310                 $oldPass = $user->getPassword();
00311 
00312                 $user->setPassword($newPass, true);
00313                 $userMapper->save($user);
00314 
00315                 $mailer = new Mailer();
00316 
00317                 $subject = "Su nueva contraseña ".$this->_ci->config->item('appName');
00318                 $msg = $this->_ci->load->view("auth/remember_email", array("newPass" => $newPass), true);
00319 
00320                 if (!$mailer->send($user->getEmail(), $subject, $msg)) {
00321 
00322                     $user->setPassword($oldPass);
00323                     $userMapper->save($user);
00324                     show_error("Se produjo un error");
00325                 }
00326 
00327             } else {
00328 
00329                 $this->_ci->lang->load("auth");
00330                 $user->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->load("userDoesNotExist"));
00331             }
00332         }
00333 
00334         return $user;
00335     }
00336 
00337     /**
00338      * Login de usuario
00339      * @param User_Data $user
00340      * @param string $passwd
00341      * @param integer $remember (valor igual a 1 para recordar al usuario más allá de la sesión actual)
00342      * @return boolean | User_Data
00343      */
00344     public function login(User_Data $user, $passwd = null, $remember = 0)
00345     {
00346         if (!$user->isValid()) {
00347 
00348             return $user;
00349         }
00350 
00351         $userMapper = new User_Mapper;
00352         $tmp_user = array_shift($userMapper->find($user));
00353 
00354         if ($tmp_user instanceof User_Data and (is_null($passwd) or $tmp_user->checkPassword($passwd))) {
00355 
00356             $user = $tmp_user;
00357             if($user->getActivated() == 0) {
00358 
00359                 $this->_ci->lang->load("auth");
00360                 $user->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unactivedUser"));
00361                 return $user;
00362             }
00363 
00364             if ( ! defined('CONSOLE')) {
00365 
00366                 $user->setLastVisit(date("Y-m-d H:i:s"));
00367                 $userMapper->save($user);
00368             }
00369 
00370             $this->_ci->session->set_userdata("id", $user->getid());
00371             $this->_ci->session->set_userdata('accessCounter', 0);
00372 
00373             if ($remember == 1) {
00374                 $this->_ci->session->set_userdata("RememeberMe", $remember);
00375             }
00376 
00377             //resetear las cuentas para evitar problemas con la persistencia.
00378             $this->_accounts = null;
00379 
00380             $this->_user = $user;
00381             return true;
00382 
00383         } else {
00384 
00385             $kont = (int) $this->_ci->session->userdata('accessCounter');
00386             $this->_ci->session->set_userdata('accessCounter', $kont+1);
00387             $this->_ci->lang->load("auth");
00388             $user->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("invalidUserPass"));
00389             return $user;
00390         }
00391     }
00392

00397     public function logout()
00398     {
00399         $this->_ci->session->sess_destroy();
00400     }

00402     /**
00403      * Crea una nueva cuenta de usuario y envia un email de bienvenida
00404      * @param User_Data $user
00405      * @return User_Data
00406      */
00407     public function register(User_Data $user)
00408     {
00409         if (!$user->isValid()) {
00410             return $user;
00411         }
00412 
00413         $userMapper = User_Mapper::get_instance();
00414 
00415         $where = "username = '".$user->getUserName()."'";
00416         $results = $userMapper->find($where);
00417 
00418         if (is_array($results) and count($results) == 0) {
00419 
00420             $this->_ci->load->helper("string");
00421             $user->setActivationCode(random_string())
00422             ->setActivated("0");
00423 
00424             $user->setId($userMapper->save($user));
00425 
00426             if (is_numeric($user->getId())) {
00427 
00428                 $mailer = new Mailer();
00429 
00430                 $subject = 'Bienvenido a '.$this->_ci->config->item('appName');
00431                 $msg = $this->_ci->load->view("auth/confirmation_email", array("obj" => $user), true);
00432 
00433                 if (!$mailer->send($user->getEmail(), $subject, $msg)) {
00434 
00435                     $userMapper->delete($user);
00436                     $user->resetAll(true);
00437                 }
00438             }
00439 
00440         } else {
00441 
00442             $this->_ci->lang->load("auth");
00443             $user->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("alreadyExistingUserEmail"));
00444         }
00445 
00446         return $user;
00447     }

00459 
00460         return false;
